welcome: Welcome to Rick and Morty GraphiQL API
toLogIn: To use GraphiQL you need to log in.
toEditor: Now you can go to the Editor

error.email-already-in-use: This email address is already registered in the system.
error.user-not-found: The user with this email address was not found in the system.
error.too-many-requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
error.user-disabled: User is disabled in the system.
